alert.note: Alert for Appling; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pierce, central Brantley, southwestern Wayne and southern Appling Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 509 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blackshear, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blackshear, Nahunta, Patterson, Screven, Offerman, Hickox, Raybon, Hortense and Broadhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
